text: Tonatia is a small genus of South and Central American phyllostomid bats. ==Species== :Greater round-eared bat, Tonatia bidens Spix, 1823 :Stripe-headed round-eared bat, Tonatia saurophila Koopman & Williams, 1951 ==References== Category:Phyllostomidae Category:Bat genera Category:Taxa named by John Edward Gray
title: Tonatia
